function RIR_EP05_12()
    -- .転-1【2月第3週】「頂点へと続く茨の道へ」
    SaveData.Title = "頂点へと続く茨の道へ"

    -- //BG：メインストリート・冬
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ac")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav")

    MSG([[ At the start of the week, a shock ran through Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    MSG([[ Not long after Erika’s shocking withdrawal, I, her knight Lira, announced my candidacy for the Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ As expected, on my way to school I caught flak from various people. ]])

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒×３
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB09aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Unknown Senior】
 “Hey Hoozuki. What do you mean by running in the Princess Election?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Unknown Senior】
 “Do you really think you’re qualified to participate when you’re not even a ‘Princess’?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0006.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Unknown Senior】
 “It’s an insult to Lady Hermes! Withdraw your candidacy immediately!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ea")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1213.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Oh ho, say whatever you want.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Unknown Senior】
 “W-what’s with that tone?!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Unknown Senior】
 “Gah!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Unknown Senior】
 “Know your shame!” ]])

    MSG([[ This unwelcoming vibe feels very nostalgic. It’s been a while. ]])

    MSG([[ When I first got famous in middle school, it was definitely like this. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07aa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1214.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 (Gals didn’t stand a chance in this prestigious girls’ school. Back then... “that one” was the only one who stood by me.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Ignoring the seniors’ protests, I reminisced about my middle school days with fondness. ]])

    MSG([[ Unaware of that, “that one” came at me just like old times and snapped back at the seniors. ]])

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒×３、ヒユ（真剣）
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,700,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB06aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB09aa")
    --LAYER_POSITION(60,300,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ag")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUL_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,0,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0407.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Please stop making false accusations. Lady Lira’s candidacy is Erika Onee-sama’s will. According to the rules of the Princess Election, there shouldn’t be any problem, right?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019ac")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-250,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,250,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)


PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Unknown Senior】
 “Guh…! W-we’re asking what kind of person you are! The rules don’t matter!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0408.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “People who surround and intimidate someone younger in a group of three have no right to question what it means to be human!” ]])

    MSG([[ The seniors recoil at Hiyu’s fierce tone. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ea")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1215.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Whew! Haha, you said it. As expected of a true yuri berserker.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0409.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Lady Lira.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07fc")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1216.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Sorry, sorry, I’ll zip it.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Hiyu silenced my lighthearted remark with a glare and continued. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0410.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Lady Lira is a skilled contender who put on a neck-and-neck Princess Election battle with Lady Daria. She unquestionably has the right to run in the Princess Election.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0411.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “If you’re all proud students of Yuriai Private Academy, stop bullying your juniors based on emotions!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia-knight_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Unknown Senior】
 “Hmph…! You’ll regret it when you get soundly defeated by Lady Hermes!” ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-900,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,-450,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    -- //BU：ヒユ（真剣）
    --LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_HIY01ba")

    MSG([[ Having uttered those parting words, the seniors hurried away. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ia")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1217.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Thanks, Hiyu. I was kinda stuck and didn’t want to argue back.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_HIY01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,700,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0412.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “...Geez. This almost feels like I’m really Lady Lira’s ‘knight’... or even a request from Erika Onee-sama, which makes me feel complicated.” ]])

    MSG([[ The reason Hiyu is so firmly on my side is thanks to Minato-kun—or rather, Erika. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    -- //BU：エリカ・入院服（笑顔）、ヒユ（驚き）、モブ女子生Ａ・Ｂ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Right after I promised to run in the Princess Election in her place, Erika gathered her “knights” in the hospital room and asked them to support me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1632.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “I can’t say much... but in the next Princess Election, what’s at stake is the fate of someone very dear to me.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1633.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “To protect that precious person, I absolutely must defeat Hermes-san.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1634.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 “I truly feel bad for involving everyone... but I would be so grateful if you could support Lady Lira in my place.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0413.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “Hyaaaah!? P-please raise your head, Erika Onee-sama!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_HIY01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0414.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 “We will take responsibility and unite as one to support Lady Lira! And dedicate our victory to Onee-sama!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：1F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）、ヒユ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0455.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Lady Lira, I’ve prepared the promised posters. Now, let’s start putting these up.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ea")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1218.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Thanks, Uran Senpai! I really appreciate you showing your support for me so quickly!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0456.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 “Hehe, Erika-san and Lady Lira deserve happiness after all. I’ll support you as much as you need.” ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing my name written on the “Princess Election” posters, I trembled. ]])

    MSG([[ It wasn’t from fear. It was a shiver of excitement. The pinnacle of Yuriai Private Academy that I always admired— ]])

    MSG([[ Challenging the national idol “Hermes Himegami” feels like a dream come true. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ia")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1219.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 “Well then, whether we laugh or cry, the die is cast. For Minato-kun’s sake, I absolutely have to win!” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP05_13")
end
